creator: Pascual Gorrita
descriptionHtml:
All creatures in your pocket. Now with Hisui's creatures!

· Which will be better?
Create the best team possible by comparing creature stats

· Change it!
Adjust the application to your liking and improve your user experience.

· PokeWordle
Play a variant of the famous game, adapted with the names of the 898 creatures. Check your knowledge 1 time per day.

· PokeCards
Open packs and complete all albums. Remember to redeem your PokeCoins daily.

· PokeFusion
Fuse your favorite creatures and share the result with your friends

· PokeQuiz
Test your knowledge of the saga with quick quizzes.

· Catch calculator
Check the chances you have to capture a creature considering all possible scenarios.

And much more..

Download the app and discover all the uses and options it has.
descriptionShort: All the information about each creature and much more in a single application.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added Hisui forms and creatures
- Added the PokeQuiz
- Added the movements of each creature
- Added a creature capture chance calculator
- Added the PokeCards and their own album
- Improvements in some names
- Fix some errors in the audios creatures

title: PokePedia - English

creator: Pascual Gorrita
descriptionHtml:
All creatures in your pocket. Now with Hisui's creatures!

· All the detailed information about the 905 creatures. Also their cries. Turn on it in the settings! 🔊

· Moves, items, abilities, natures... All the information in two clicks.

· Build your team! 🔨
Enhance your adventure with the team builder. Assign moves, items, abilities, natures... Then look at the team's global stats.

· Which will be better? 🆚
Create the best team possible by comparing creature stats

· Change it! 📐
Adjust the application to your liking and improve your user experience.

· PokeWordle 🔡
Play a variant of the famous game, adapted with the names of the 898 creatures. Check your knowledge 1 time per day.

· PokeCards 🃏
Open packs and complete all albums. Remember to redeem your PokeCoins daily.

· PokeFusion ✨
Fuse your favorite creatures and share the result with your friends

· PokeQuiz 🤓
Test your knowledge of the saga with quick quizzes.

· Catch calculator 🧮
Check the chances you have to capture a creature considering all possible scenarios.

And much more..

Download the app and discover all the uses and options it has.
descriptionShort: All the information about each creature and much more in a single application.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fixed a bug in creature descriptions.
- Added Miscellany button.
- Added last Card Sets (Lost Origin).
- Added daily wheel.
- Added team builder.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Updated the order of the last gen.

· Order of the types in some creatures. (Thanks J.A.E)
· Shroodle and Grafaiai evolution chain.
· Some 9th gen PK stats.

Test your knowledge of the saga with quick quizzes.

· Catch calculator 🧮

And much more.

Download the app and discover all the uses and options it has.
descriptionShort: All the information about each creature and much more in a single application.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added new creatures Walking Wake and Iron Leaves
- Added new moves.
- Fixed bug when loading the sprite in the random creature.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
